source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Bobbin Lace Supplies
items.headline: Learn what supplies you will need to make bobbin lace.
objectives_summary: You will learn what bobbin lace supplies you need to get started making lace.
Where to get supplies or how to make them yourself.

items.title: Joy of Acrylic Painting_China Rose II
items.headline: Extreme 3-D and impasto acrylic Panting
objectives_summary: How to create a piece of 3-D painted and sculptured Art

items.title: How to make a DIY Soap Mold on a budget.
items.headline: Make a custom size, plastic or wooden soap mold on a budget
objectives_summary: How to make a plastic soap mold as well as a wooden soap mold.

items.title: Chinese painting for beginner
items.headline: Chinese painting tutorial for those who have been thinking how to start
objectives_summary: Basic skills to start to paint the Chinese Painting

items.title: The Bell 412 Helicopter
items.headline: Learn the basics of the Bell 412 in a flight simulator
objectives_summary: The basics of flying the Bell 412 helicopter in a flight simulator
Takeoff, Landing, Hovering
Single and Dual Engine Failures

items.title: Animal Sketching & Drawing for Beginners
items.headline: Drawing & Art Course with sketches Drawing
objectives_summary: Drawing Basically
Figure drawing
Volumetric Drawing

visible_instructors.title: Ashlee Craft

items.headline: Use a variety of arts & craft techniques & materials to make three different styles of plush bees.
objectives_summary: How to creatively design plush animals
Designing stuffed animals & puppets
How to design & craft three styles of plush bumble bees

items.title: FREE class - Sew an easy drawstring bag in three sizes
items.headline: Beginner friendly pattern and instruction to sew a pretty drawstring bag in three sizes. FREE sewing pattern included
objectives_summary: How to print a digital sewing pattern and put it together
Three ways to use a pattern piece to cut fabric
How to get the perfect finish with fusible interfacing

items.headline: A Free class to present this amazing new world for you!
objectives_summary: Learn how to craft a pet Paracord collar with a quick single class

items.title: Easy, quick start into oil painting
items.headline: Painting a unique cute bird on canvas
objectives_summary: Set up your space and materials
Make your very unique base on the canvas
start planning and painting in oil

items.title: Weave a small square basket with paper

visible_instructors.job_title: Weaving is a way of life
visible_instructors.name: Rita
visible_instructors.title: Rita Baker

items.headline: Easy to follow step by step instructions and introduction to basketry weaving
objectives_summary: How to make a small container/basket from paper
Learn simple weaving technique
be creative with simple materials

items.title: The Joy of Creating an Acrylic Blue Moon Artwork
items.headline: 3-D textured artwork
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create a 3-D textured surface on certain objects within the painting. Highlighting them and drawing interest to that area. the students will learn preparation of applied pieces as well as the application and the merging of the pieces into the artwork. Methods of texturizing and tools to achieve these methods are discussed.

items.title: Polymer Clay Kaleidoscope Canes
items.headline: Adventures in Polymer Clay Canes
objectives_summary: How to make polymer clay kaleidoscope canes from simple component canes

objectives_summary: Coloring techniques
Using color pencils
Creative Thinking

items.title: Kintsugi course1　 " How to fix a very small chip"
items.headline: 金継ぎコース　コース1「小さな欠けを直す」
objectives_summary: Experience traditional Kintsugi work　伝統的な金継ぎの作業を体験できる
Get an opportunity to experience Japanese culture　日本文化に触れる機会が得られる
Learn safe repair of broken or chipped vessels　壊れたり欠けたりした器の安全な修復が学べる
